parametrized_description: An international goods exporter uses ships and planes to transport goods. Each ship can carry ShipCapacity containers and consumes ShipFuel liters of fuel per trip. Each plane can carry PlaneCapacity containers and consumes PlaneFuel liters of fuel per trip. The company needs to transport at least MinContainers containers. Additionally, no more than MaxPlaneTrips plane trips can be made, and at least MinShipTripFraction of the total trips must be by ship. The objective is to minimize the total fuel consumption.

ShipCapacity.description: Capacity of a ship in containers

ShipFuel.description: Fuel usage of a ship per trip in liters

PlaneCapacity.description: Capacity of a plane in containers

PlaneFuel.description: Fuel usage of a plane per trip in liters

MinContainers.description: Minimum number of containers to transport

MinShipTripFraction.description: Minimum fraction of trips that must be by ship

constraints.description: The total number of containers transported by ships and planes must be at least MinContainers.
No more than MaxPlaneTrips plane trips can be made.
At least MinShipTripFraction of the total trips must be by ship.

objective.description: Minimize the total fuel consumption, which is the sum of fuel used by ships and planes based on the number of trips made.
